summary: Rami Haruvi, a daring Mossad Agent, is sent to rescue the abducted US ambassador held at the state of Sugyra. If Rami fails his mission, the annual mossad vacation at "Olga Resort" will be ... See full summary »
cast: Ron Shahar|Ilan Dar|Lana Ettinger|Iris Abramovich|Larry Butchins|Eli Gorenstein|Elad Sharabi|Dov Friedman|Yaniv Adani|Roshel Aronov|Maytal Ben Hamo|Yoel Evyatar|Omer Frenkel|Anat Gidron|Alon Gur Arye|Evyatar Halimi|Sigal Levi|Gil Manor|Ram Manor|Dani Nae|Shraga Newmark|Omer Pinto|Orly Yosefov
title: Hamosad Hasagur
